name: hepatic steatosis
description: Fat buildup in liver, seen as fainter on CT scans, often with liver appearing less dense than spleen, and on MRI, fat causing signal loss. Ultrasound shows liver as brighter due to fat, affecting how sound waves pass through

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether hepatic steatosis is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of hepatic steatosis

attributes.name: severity field
attributes.description: degree of fat accumulation in the liver

values.name: mild
values.description: small amount of fat accumulation in the liver

values.name: moderate
values.description: moderate amount of fat accumulation in the liver

values.name: severe
values.description: severe amount of fat accumulation in the liver
